c74object.name: fl.uniform~
c74object.digest: Generates frames in which all values are identical.
c74object.description: The output value is set with a parameter. The length of the output is dependent on the mode parameter. Output length may be set by parameter or based on that of the trigger input.

entry.name: 2. /mode [enum]
entry.description:
Controls how the output length is determined:
requested - the output length is set by the length parameter.
input - the output length follows the length of the trigger input.
[0] - requested [1] - input

entry.name: 3. /length [int]
entry.description: Sets the requested output length in the units specified by the units parameter.

entry.name: 4. /units [enum]
entry.description:
Sets the units used for the length parameter.
[0] - samples [1] - ms [2] - seconds
